DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial aim assess pharmacokinetic interaction celecoxib rebamipide healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: The Pharmacokinetic Interaction Between Celecoxib Rebamipide
DOC.criteria: Body weight ae least 50kg BMI ( body mass index ) within range 18 27kg/m2 Agreement write informed consent Subject symptoms acute disease within 28days prior study medication dose Subject know history affect absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug Subject clinically significant active cardiovascular , respiratory , renal , endocrine , hematologic , gastrointestinal , neurologic , autoimmunologic disease malignant tumor Subject unsuitable clinical test medical checkup ( medical history , physical examination , ECG , laboratory test ) within 28days prior study medication dose Subject follow finding ; i. AST ( sGOT ) ALT ( sGPT ) > 1.5 fold normal value ii . Total bilirubin > 1.5 fold normal value Subject clinically significant allergic disease ( except mild allergic rhinitis , mild allergic dermatitis seem need medication ) Subject know hypersensitivity reaction celecoxib , rebamipide , sulphonamide analog Subject asthma , acute rhinitis , nasal polyp , angioedema , urticaria , allergic reaction aspirin NSAIDs ( include COX2 inhibitor ) Subject hereditary disorder galactose intolerance , Lapp lactase deficiency glucosegalactose malabsorption Use prescription medication within 14 day prior study medication dosing Use medication ( Overthecounter medication , oriental medication , vitamin ) within 7 day prior study medication dose Subject take meal affect absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug Subject able take institutional standard meal Whole blood donation within 60days , component blood donation within 20days receive blood transfusion within 30days prior study medication dose Participation clinical investigation within 60days prior study medication dose Continued excessive use caffeine ( caffeine > five cups/day ) , alcohol ( alcohol > 30g/day ) severe heavy smoker ( cigarette > 10 cigarette per day ) An impossible one participate clinical trial investigator 's decision include reason laboratory test result
